reviewText: If you thought only the UFC could put on a good show in the US, than your wrong. Sometimes you don't need big names for a action packed fight. KOTC puts a great event  with a lot of action and blood. This dvd dose have well known MMA fighters on it,
This dvd seems better put together than the ealier KOTC dvds. There are some good fights, early fight from Joe Stevenson is very good, some familar faces from previous KOTC dvds.
